head.supplied: Melbourne botanic Garden ¶ 9/7/72. ¶ Sir ¶ ¶ In accordance with instructions, received this day, ¶ I have the honor to submit to you a return ¶ ¶ 1, of the detail expenditure of the wages-vote of t...

div.p: G72/18553, unit 750, VPRS 44/P inward registered and unregistered correspondence, VA 538 Department of Crown Lands and Survey, Public Record Office, Victoria.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p:
In accordance with instructions, received this day,
Instructions not found. I have the honor to submit to you a return

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p: 1, of the detail expenditure of the wages-vote of the last financial year.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p:
2, of the detail expenditure of the vote for stores &c of the last financial year.
Compare with estimates in M to C. Duffy, 11 March 1872. A further estimate was submitted in July but cannot now be found; see notes to M to J. Casey, 14 July 1872.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p: I have the honor to be, Sir, your obedient servant

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p: The honorable the President of the Board of Land & Works.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;

div.p: Employees of the Melbourne Botanic Gardens, paid out of the Wages Vote 1871/2
